firstcity,259,220,3	script	Brock	10210,{

	callshop "Weapon1", 0;
	end;
	
	case 2:
	callshop "Weapon2", 0;
	end;

icecastle,63,217,5	script	กุ๊กไก่ร้านค่าเร่	10235,{
switch(select("แร่ต่างๆ:ของทำยา")) {

	case 1:
	callshop "Rare", 0;
	end;
	
	case 2:
	callshop "ya", 0;
	end;
		
OnInit:
	waitingroom "ร้านทำยาและแร่",0;
	
}
}
